video_prompt: A woman in a race suit intensely steers a high-speed, silver and red vehicle, its thrusters emitting blue light. The background blurs past, emphasizing the vehicle's rapid motion as it kicks up dust, speeding along a grey road with a streaking white line. Her expression is focused on the unfolding road ahead.
image_prompt: futuristic racing, a woman in a grey and red race suit drives a silver-grey and red speeder with a white racing stripe, black hair, looking forward, hands on controls. The car has two wheels visible in front, two in back, additional mechanical components, a yellow triangular warning sticker, and a white cross emblem. Cylindrical thrusters with blue lights are visible at the back, kicking up dust. The setting is a blurry grey asphalt road with a white line, and a red-striped barrier on the right. In the corner, "C29" logo. Action shot, background blurred, foreground in focus.
refined_video_prompt: A high-speed vehicle accelerates, its thrusters emitting pulsing blue light while rapidly kicking up dust. The background blurs into streaking lines, emphasizing its intense motion. Inside, a woman intensely steers, her focused expression tracking the unfolding, rapidly approaching road ahead.
